data.actual_result: No apps appear in the Application Window section
data.expected_result: You should be able to select any app open, since the desktops aren't necessarily separated/isolated from each other
data.short_description: Apps that aren't on the same desktop as Discord, can't be selected in the Application Window section when choosing what screen to share [Mac Specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Have no apps open in the same desktop as Discord - Click the screenshare button in a call - Go to Application Window tab - Observe
